original_text: When the people are ready to move, Aaron and his sons must go into the Tent of Meeting. They must take down the curtain that is in front of the Covenant Box. They must cover the Covenant Box with the curtain.
korean_text: 진영이 전진할 때에 아론과 그의 아들들이 들어가서 칸 막는 휘장을 걷어 증거궤를 덮고

sentences.original_text: When the people are ready to move
Aaron and his sons must go into the Tent of Meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그의 아들들은 회막으로 들어가야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must take down the curtain
that is in front of the Covenant Box
They must cover the Covenant Box with the curtain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 휘장으로 언약 궤를 덮어야 합니다
